title: Does anyone know if Super Galactic Shyvanna has had/will have an early sale?
body:
Its a friend of mine's birthday soon and I wanted to get him Super Galaxy Shyv. 
But if it is going on sale soon, then I will buy him another skin and let him buy Shyv himself when it goes on sale (because buying him a skin thats about to go on sale in a month or so, is counter productive) 

So does anyone know if Super galaxy Shyv has already been on sale, and if it hasn't been on sale yet will it go on sale? and if it will, when?

thanks a lot :)

replies.body:
Super Galaxy Shyvanna hasn't had a sale yet. It will have an early sale where it drops to 975 RP fairly soon I believe (roughly 2 months), but the normal 50% off sale shouldn't be for almost another year.

I find [this list](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1T5h1LKTRCVg3NU9XA3NSlrGS1dF5YO6KfEePIL893SU/) is fairly handy for predicting sales. It's usually accurate to within a few weeks.

Skins typically go on early sale ~6 months after release. Skins that are part of a series, like Super Galaxy, have their early sales spread out with one per month. An example is the Beast Hunter skins, they were released in Feb and went on early sale one at a time in June, July, and August.

Sooo, while I don't know when we might have SG Shyvana go on early sale, as it was released at the end of May I would predict it to happen in October, November or December.

Ah ok thank you, i didn't know about the spread out part of the sale. Thats perfect news, i shall get him some other skins instead for his bday, and he can get shyv later on in the year, thanks heaps :)
